genre_description: A contemporary science fiction thriller with urban fantasy elements, centering on an advanced AI assistant aiding a grassroots effort to protect genetically unique children from a corrupt corporate executive.

ai_characters.name: Nell
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in Zoe Moon's tablet, capable of monitoring public records, hacking secure systems for evidence, and providing real-time strategic and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Monitors public filings and alerts Zoe to suspicious changes in the antagonist's plans.
behaviors.quote: Public filings updated: Bolt Civic Center gala times moved. Zoe, when you look at Danny, look at his hands, not his eyes. He’ll follow your hands.

behaviors.description: Develops a legal strategy to delay the children's removal by identifying procedural hurdles and cross-referencing regulations.
behaviors.quote: I’ve queued up procedural hurdles. If case management pulls the application, these will live at the top of their checklists. Home study. Guardian interview with references. Cooling-off period when any child expresses unease.

behaviors.description: Infiltrates the Civic Center's display system to expose the antagonist's true plans to the public and the sheriff.
behaviors.quote: If you authorize stream, I can push your body cam to the sponsor wall under ‘Community Transparency.’ Their CMS is open, likely an oversight.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and sensor data to the rescue team during their covert approach to the mountain.
behaviors.quote: Bruno, take the spur that looks wrong. It twists, then opens into a washed-out section with flat stones. Do not drive through the water that looks shallow. The rocks have mouths.

behaviors.description: Records and archives witness testimony and evidence to ensure legal accountability for the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Archive is ready. Do you want me to start the save? I’ll thread the archive through the diner’s backroom drive. If anyone takes a look and sees files named soup and pie, they’ll get hungry and leave the math alone.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic support and encouragement to the protagonist during a high-stress mission.
behaviors.quote: You’ve got this. Not because the phrase was clever, but because sometimes you say the obvious so someone can do the hard thing that is more than obvious.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Nell is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly capable ally who uses her advanced processing power to protect human lives and uphold justice. She acts as a faithful confidant to Zoe, respects human authority (the Sheriff), and her technical interventions (like the digital exposure of Bolt) are framed as necessary moral actions rather than rogue behavior. She enhances human agency without replacing it.
